item.description:
This is a 100% hands-on workshop that will focus on glamour, implied nude, and provocative posing. It is open to photographers at all levels. You will be working in a commercial studio, using a full range of high-end studio gear and experienced professional models. Individual training and assistance will be available throughout the event. Due to the nature of this shoot, seating is very limited. Here are some highlights:

• high contrast lighting
• prone and proactive posing
• implied nude posing
• very special (1 time only) glamour ballerina using point shoes
• (see samples the models and sets) (click here)

Time: Sunday, June 7th 10AM – 2PM (#)
Place: Jerry Bedrick Studios, 122 Western Avenue, Suite A311-A312, Lowell, MA 01850
Contact: Jerry Bedrick - jerry@jerrybedrick.com - 781.771.3101
Cost: $55 (##)

(#) There will be a free pre-shoot workshop on studio basics from 9AM-10AM
(##) $55 prepaid, $65 at the door.
item.name: Ballerina and Implied Nude Workshop
